title._content: ["Gardenside," Frederick Augustus Snow house, Ox Pasture Road, Southampton, New York. (LOC)

description._content: Johnston, Frances Benjamin,, 1864-1952,, photographer. ["Gardenside," Frederick Augustus Snow house, Ox Pasture Road, Southampton, New York. Flower garden] [ca. 1914] 1 photograph : glass lantern slide, hand-colored ; 3.25 x 4 in. Notes: Site History. Landscape: Clarence Fowler, circa 1913. Associated Name: Mary Palen (Mrs. Frederick A.) Snow. Other: For garden plan, see LC-J717-X103-4. Today: Garden not extant. Photographed when Frances Benjamin Johnston and Mattie Edwards Hewitt worked together. Title, date, and subject information provided by Sam Watters, 2011. Forms part of: Garden and historic house lecture series in the Frances Benjamin Johnston Collection (Library of Congress). Subjects: Gardens--New York (State)--Southampton--1910-1920. Flowers--New York (State)--Southampton--1910-1920. Format: Lantern slides--Hand-colored--1910-1920. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print Higher resolution image is available (Persistent URL): hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ppmsca.16257 Call Number: LC-J717-X100- 48
